lokaye oonama ratak idiriyata gos aththe adhyapanaya thula karana lada wiplawayan samanga bawath, rate sanwardhanaya wenuwen adhyapana paddhathiya shakthimath wima athyawashya sadhakayak bawath, ee sandaha dayaka wiya haki paridi ape rate adhyapana paddhathiya yawathkalina kirimata piyawara ganna bawath, ehidi paksha, tharathiram, paudgalika deshapalana nyaya pathra paseka thaba niwaradiwa ha sadharanawa ha winiwidabhawayen katayuthu karana ayata pramukhathawa laba dima thama aramuna bawath adhyapana amathya akila wiraj kariyawasam mahatha pawasayi.amathyawaraya me adahas pala kale, shri lanka adhyapana paripalana sewaye, shri lanka widuhalpathi sewaye, shri lanka guru sewaye pathwim ha shri lanka guru adhyapanagnya sewaye usas wim laba dima wenuwen adhyapana amathyansha shrawanagaraye ada (15) pawathi pathwim pradanothsawayata ek wemini.

hithopadesha 10 onlayin bayibalaya | nawa lowa pariwarthanaya hithopadesha 10:1-32 10 salamonge hithopadeshayanya.+ pragnyawantha puthek thama piyawa prithiyata path karayi.+ namuth agnyana putheku thama mawata shokayaki.+ 2 dushtayage wasthuwen kisi prayojanayak natha.+ maranayen galawanu labanne dharmishta lesa hasirena pudgalayawayi.+ 3 yehowa dewi dharmishta thanaththawa kusaginne nothabayi.+ namuth dushtayange aashawan ohu ishta nokarayi.+ 4 alasakamin wada karanna dilindukamata wateyi.+ namuth uthsahawanthaya pohosath weyi.+ 5 aswanna nelana kalayedi bara nindaka pasu wana puthraya thama demapiyanta lajjawaki.+ namuth buddhimathwa katayuthu karana puthraya gimhanaye aswanna ras karaganiyi. 6 aashirwada labenne dharmishtayataya.+ eheth dushtaya thama wachanawalin darunu chethana sangawayi.+ 7 dharmishtayage honda nama samada sihi weyi.+ namuth dushtayage nama asimath pilikulaki.+ 8 pragnyawanthawa sithana thanaththa ana pilipadimata kamaththak dakwayi.+ eheth agnyanawa katha karana thanaththawa paga damanu labe.+ 9 dewita wishwasawanthawa sitina thanaththa surakshithawa gaman karayi.+ eheth wankakamin katayuthu karannage kriya heli weyi.+ 10 rawatilikara lesa aswalin ingi karanna wedanawa athi karayi.+ agnyanawa katha karana thanaththawa paga damanu labe.+ 11 dharmishtayage wachana jiwanaya gena deyi.+ eheth dushtaya thama wachanawalin darunu chethana sangawayi.+ 12 wairayen dabara hataganiyi.+ namuth premaya siyalu waradi amathaka kara damayi.+ 13 honda awabodhayakin katayuthu karana thanaththa pragnyawanthawa katha karayi.+ eheth wewala sada thibenne agnyanayata thalannayi.+ 14 pragnyawanthaya danuma wasthuwak se rakagani.+ eheth agnyanayage mukhaya ikmaninma ohuwa winashayata pamunuwayi.+ 15 dhanawathekuge watina dewal ohuta balakotuwaki.+ dilindunge nasthiyata hethu wanne owunge dilindukamayi.+ 16 dharmishtayage kriyakalapaya hethuwen ohuta jiwanaya ath weyi.+ eheth dushtaya thama upayagath de nisa papayata pelambaeyi.+ 17 hikmawimata priya karanna an ayawa jiwanayata manga penwayi.+ namuth awawadayata pitu panna anunwa nomanga yawayi.+ 18 boru wachanawalin keneku thama wairaya sangawayi.+ anun gana apahasathmaka katha pathuruwanna agnyanayeki.+ 19 kathabaha wadi wu wita waradakata hasu wime idakadada wadiya.+ eheth buddhimath thanaththa thama wachana kalpanakariwa hasuruwayi.+ 20 dharmishtayage wachana pawithra ridi meni.+ eheth dushtayage sitha kisi watinakamak nathi tharamya.+ 21 dharmishtaya thama kathawen bohodenekuwa aaraksha karayi.+ eheth modayo thama agnyanakam* nisa miya yathi.+ 22 yehowa dewige aashirwadaya saba wasthuwaki.+ ohu eeta kisi wedanawak ek nokarayi.+ 23 agnyanaya nindithawa hasirenne winodayatayi.+ eheth watahaganime hakiyawa athi minisa pragnyawa soya yayi.+ 24 dushtaya yam deyakata bhayin sitinneda ohu pitata paminenneth ee demaya.+ namuth dharmishtayange aasha itu karanu labe.+ 25 sulisulangak hama awasan wannak men dushtaya paha wi yayi.+ eheth dharmishtaya sadahatama pawathina aththiwaramak meni.+ 26 winakiriwalata dath hiriwatennak menda dumen as dawilla gannak menda alasayekuwa sewayata bandawaganna thanaththada wedana windinneya.+ 27 yehowa dewi kerehi garubiya athuwa sitimen digu kal jiwath wiya hakiyi.+ namuth dushtayange jiwithaya keti karanu labe.+ 28 dharmishtayanta aththe prithimath apekshawaki.+ namuth dushtayange balaporoththu sun weyi.+ 29 yehowa dewige margaya nirdosha ayata aarakshawaki.+ namuth napuru de karana ayata ath wanne winashayayi.+ 30 dharmishtayawa solawanna kisiwekuta nohaka.+ eheth dushtayanta samadamath polowe jiwath wimata ida nolabe.+ 31 dharmishtayage muwin nikmenne pragnyawantha wachanaya.*+ eheth wanka lesa katha karana ayawa sadahatama nihanda karanu labe.+ 32 dharmishtayage muwin sithganna wachana pita weyi.+ namuth dushtayange mukhayen nikmenne dushitha adahasya.+ ^ mu.a., “pragnyawe pala.”
